headline: Coterra Energy Announces Planned Executive Retirements
summary: HOUSTON, March 06, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today announced the planned retirements of two executive officers of the Company, Stephen P. Bell, Executive Vice President—Business Development, and Todd M. Roemer, Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer. Mr. Bell intends to retire in late 2025 and Mr. Roemer intends to retire in 2026 after the filing of the Company’s 2025 Form 10-K.
